events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking number shows no updates for several days.
System identified the issue as a delivery delay based on keywords in the customer message.
Assigning the case to the logistics support agent team for further investigation into the shipment status.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your order hasn’t arrived yet. I’m here to help you figure out what’s going on.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking info you have so I can check the status?
Sure, the order number is 789456123 and the tracking number is TRK123456789. I looked online but the last update was 5 days ago.
I checked with our shipping partner and it appears the package is delayed due to weather issues. We expect delivery within the next 3 days.
Thanks for the update. I hope it arrives soon. Please keep me posted if there are any further delays.
We confirm your package was delivered today. Please check and let us know if everything is in order.
Just checking in to make sure that your order arrived in good condition and you’re satisfied with the resolution.
We’re closing this case now. Feel free to contact us anytime if you need more assistance.
